articles.title: Moelis banker recorded in punching incident charged with assault - Financial Times
articles.description: Jonathan Kaye turned himself in to authorities a week after resigning from senior role at boutique advisory firm
articles.content:
A former senior investment banker at Moelis who was filmed punching someone at a New York City Pride event last month has been arrested on assault charges.

articles.title: Circle Snags First Stablecoin License Under EU's New MiCA Crypto Rules - CoinDesk
articles.description: Circle Mint France will issue the euro-denominated EURC stablecoin and USDC in the European Union in compliance with MiCA.
articles.content:
• Circle is claiming bragging rights as the first global stablecoin issuer to comply with MiCA.

articles.title: Netflix and Amazon Dominate Commissioning by Streamers, Tilting the Content Market Away From U.S., Towards Local: Study - Variety
articles.description: A new study shows Netflix and Amazon dominating original commissioning by streamers and how they are tilting the market towards local content.
articles.content:
Netflix and Amazon returned to dominance in commissioning of original content worldwide in the first quarter of this year, according to research and consultancy firm Ampere Analysis.
